Title: Instagram Filter App
Description: Instagram is a popular photo and video sharing web app that allows the user to upload photos or videos and share them with their followers or with a select group of friends. They can also view, comment and like posts shared by their friends on Instagram. One of the features Instagram has is filtering photos with different effects. This project clones the basic functionalities of Instagram's filter feature.

Title: Crown Clothing E-Commerce Website
Description: This is a e-commerce website where the user can register and login with google, add different types of cloths to the cart and being able to check out.

Title: Music Playing Website
Description: This website was inspired by spotify. This website allows the user to register and login. Then the user can upload mp3 files through the manage page. Once the upload is done, the user will be able to play their music, pause on the bottom left part of the page, and be able to toggle the progress bar. The user can edit the name of the song as well as delete it. Other users can view whatever music is uploaded by other users.
